Champagne
KRUG
Krug Grande Cuvée Champagne
Made from the finest wines from the Marne district of Champagne,
Krug Grande Cuvee is known throughout the world for its
unique qualities of elegance, fine mousse and distinctive flavour.
Skilful blending under the personal control of Henri Krug
makes the Grande Cuvée an exceptionally harmonious
champagne in the unique Krug style.
Red Wines
LOUIS MAX
Sorroy Chambortin
Gevrey Chambertin La Justice 1989
Gevrey Chambertin at the northern end of the Côte de Nuits is
one of the great vinevards of the Burgundy area.
The Pinot Noir grapes give this wine the typical notes of red berries
The colour is attractive and the maturation in oak has had a balancing effect.
The 170y vintage is well regarded, lighter in style than the 1700,
tous resuune i an easy ounking and ruin wine.
Ivan Lamas
Iván Tamás Cabernet Sauvignon Reserve 1994
Iván Tamás Winery uses only the best fruit available to produce their wines.
The 1994 Cabernet Sauvignon typifies Livermore Valley Cabernet in its voluptuous up-front fruit
and assertive, but not overwhelming, backbone of tannins. This dry red Californian wine 1s
an excellent complement to roast lamb, grilled beef and many other hearty dishes.
White
Wines
Robert Mondavi Napa Valley Chardonnay 1996
This 1996 Nappa Valley Chardonnay has layers of tropical fruit, pear and
citrus flavours with a toasty/creamy nuance. A dry wine which is a delicious
accompaniment for creamy pasta or risotto dishes, seafood and other white meats.
GREEN POINT
Green Point Yarra Valley Chardonnay 1996
The 1996 Green Point Chardonnay was produced from
Chardonnay grapes grown in the Yarra Valley in Australia. Brilliant straw
yellow in colour, it has a combination of varietal fruit balanced with oak. This wine
is a perfect accompaniment to seafood and white meat dishes.
MEURSAULT
Louis Max Meursault
Les Casse-Têtes 1990
This wine Is Classed as one of the most famous white wines of France and is produced
from fine Chardonnay grapes grown on the rolling slopes of Meursault. Gold coloured.
with tints of greenish gold, it is characterized by powerful aromas of ripe fruit and discriminating flavour
of hazelnuts. This particular well balanced vintage is a dream and definitely one to remember.
It is Cathay Pacific policy not to serve alcoholic beverages to persons under 18 years of age.
CX880. 881. 020. 029.0/2. 0/3.002.803 1-12-99
